topics.body:
You know what's kind o a shame?
Bleach may suck but Kubo's artwork is pretty good. Especially in his character designs. He can make a character look cool but not add so much that it looks cluttered. And people joke about it but every one of Ichigo's redesigns looked cool.

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/541b7aeb6368726d013d0000#post_541b7aeb6368726d013d0000

"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/541b7d4b6368726e07cc0100#post_541b7d4b6368726e07cc0100

If you ever wondered how is Saint Seiya, Bleach is actually a very good analogy.

After a certain arc, (Soul Society and the Sanctuary... Trsut me, they're even more similar than you think) it all goes down and it doesn't pick up until the "Final" Arc.

The story is hheadscratching at times, but there still several elements that make both decent at worst.

topics.body:
It's random posting, but you know I really hope the let's play bubble in video gaming pops soon.  I'm getting sick of 200,000 people doing let's plays of the same video game with crappy editing and dubstep intros while bragging about their no scopes :\

Why can't we go back to the days when webcomics were popular?
<Currently crying my eyes out over a webcomic I've been waiting a year and a month to come out.
